info.name: Gnome Dark Theme Fix
info.description: A lazy global fix for those who use global dark theme with Gnome 3, which affects Firefox too.
info.additionalInfo: It's a Global theme, you may need to edit it if you're getting anoying styles throughout pages. Any major erros, please contact me =D

data.title: Style also makes the url bar white. As annoying as invisible forms.
